text: Charles Henry Sands (May 23, 1911 in Fort William, Ontario â€“ April 6, 1953) was a Canadian professional hockey right winger who played 12 seasons in the National Hockey League for the Toronto Maple Leafs, Boston Bruins, Montreal Canadiens and New York Rangers. Sands won the Stanley Cup with the Boston Bruins in 1939. ==Other websites== * Category:1911 births Category:1953 deaths Category:Boston Bruins players Category:Canadian ice hockey right wingers Category:Ice hockey people from Ontario Category:Montreal Canadiens players Category:New York Rangers players Category:Sportspeople from Thunder Bay Category:Toronto Maple Leafs players
